constituent: cleverness, every, reclining, lying down, mother, breasts, taskmaster
heisigStory: Behind every successful taskmaster, the cleverness of a fox to outwit his charges.
koohiiStory1: Every master(or taskmaster) must have some degree of cleverness.
koohiiStory2: Cleverness is something every taskmaster must have. Every taskmaster has cleverness.
myStory: khéo léo. mỗi lần đánh nhau là càng khéo léo
words: sensibility, susceptibility, sensitive (to), well attuned to
